long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ShaoLingvo Chrome extension is the perfect companion to the ShaoLingvo Mobile App. It is designed to make web browsing a vocabulary-enriching experience. Whether you're reading an article, exploring forums, or going through a research paper, expand your vocabulary seamlessly.

Key Features:

1. Web Browsing Vocabulary Populator:
While navigating the internet, simply highlight the words you want to learn, and they're instantly added to your ShaoLingvo vocabulary.

2. PDF Support:
Not just web pages! You can also enhance your vocabulary by adding words directly from PDF files.

3. AI-Powered Learning:
After adding new words, our AI-tutor intelligently crafts personalized tasks, emphasizing the repetition of these newly added words. This ensures efficient learning and better retention.

4. Instant Translation:
Curious about a word? Highlight it and get immediate translations into any language. With integration from Google Translation API, understanding and learning new words becomes a breeze.

5. Seamless Integration:
A streamlined experience that syncs effortlessly with your ShaoLingvo Mobile App. Add words on your desktop, and practice them on-the-go!
